Bags.name: Brick
Bags.description: This is a demonstration store. You can purchase products like this from Mlouye. Inspired by the structural boxy form and shape of a brick, which lends its name, the bag is perfectly sized for your everyday essentials, from a large phone to your wallet and lipstick.

details.title: Materials
details.des: Hand-crafted from Italian cow leather. UltrasuedeÂ® interior. Comes with a detachable and adjustable shoulder strap.

details.title: Shipping & Returns
details.des: Free shipping and returns available on all orders! We ship all US domestic orders within 5-10 business days!

details.title: Care Instructions
details.des: Use a soft damp cloth and a drop of mild soap to remove any haze. Air dry.
